headline: 3 Reasons to Sell PAYC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Shareholders of Paycom would probably like to forget the past six months even happened. The stock dropped 43.8% and now trades at $128.00. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: How The Story Is Shifting For Paycom Software (PAYC) After Analyst Target Resets
summary: Paycom Software is in focus after its modeled fair value was reset from US$197.18 to US$151.18, a sizeable change in the price target that many investors track closely. The shift lines up with a wave of research updates, where some analysts still see upside potential while others flag execution risks and a cooler tone on the story. As you read on, you will see how these price target moves fit into the broader analyst narrative and what to watch as it continues to evolve. Analyst Price Targets...

headline: Paycom Software Inc (NYSE:PAYC) Passes the Peter Lynch GARP Screen
summary: Paycom Software exemplifies Peter Lynch's GARP strategy with strong earnings growth, high profitability, zero debt, and an attractive PEG ratio.
